alert.note: Alert for Grant; Huntington; Wabash (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN WABASH...NORTHERN GRANT AND SOUTHWESTERN HUNTINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near La Fontaine, or near Wabash, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Marion, Gas City, Jonesboro, Sweetser, La Fontaine, Van Buren, Home Corner, Landess, Jalapa, Hanfield, Treaty, Banquo, Lake Wood, Arcana, and Somerset. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 262 and 270. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
